title: Enhancement of tryptophan 2-monooxygenase thermostability by semi-rational enzyme engineering: a strategic design to minimize experimental investigation
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,989-1001
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00102H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sirus Kongjaroon, Narin Lawan, Duangthip Trisrivirat, Pimchai Chaiyen
A semi-rational and strategic-design approach using in silico tools and site-saturation mutagenesis with minimal experimental effort was used to engineer tryptophan 2-monooxygenase to obtain thermostable variants with the same enzyme activity.
